title: Move print panel to Admin page with per-participant print functionality

requirements.text: Remove the 'Print Results' button and all print-related UI elements from the QuizSummary component (frontend/src/components/QuizSummary.tsx). The quiz summary screen should no longer expose any print functionality to quiz participants.

quotes: Panel cetak wujudkan di muka surat admin sahaja

acceptanceCriteria: The QuizSummary component does not render a 'Print Results' button or any print-trigger element
The quiz summary screen still shows score, percentage, performance message, and per-question breakdown as before
No regression in quiz flow — Restart Quiz and navigation still work correctly

requirements.text: Add a per-participant print panel to the Admin page (frontend/src/pages/AdminPage.tsx). Each row in the leaderboard table must include a 'Print' button. Clicking it opens a print-friendly view showing that individual participant's result: name, date, topic chosen, score (e.g., 9/12), percentage, and a per-question breakdown (question text, selected answer, correct answer, and correct/incorrect indicator). Triggering window.print() should only print the selected participant's result card, not the entire leaderboard table.

quotes: Panel cetak wujudkan di muka surat admin sahaja
cetakan adalah bagi setiap individu yang menjawab soalan kuiz

acceptanceCriteria: Each row in the Admin leaderboard table has a clearly labeled 'Print' button
Clicking 'Print' on a row opens or renders a print-ready view for that specific participant
The printed output contains: participant name, date, topic, score (e.g., 9/12), percentage, and a per-question breakdown
A print-specific CSS media query ensures only the selected participant's result card is printed and the leaderboard table, navigation, and decorative elements are hidden during print
The print view does not interfere with the normal on-screen rendering of the Admin page

requirements.text: Update the print-specific CSS media query in frontend/src/index.css to hide the quiz summary print section (if any remains) and ensure only the per-participant admin print card is shown when printing from the Admin page.

quotes: Panel cetak wujudkan di muka surat admin sahaja

acceptanceCriteria: The @media print CSS rules target the admin participant print card and ensure all other page elements (leaderboard, header, buttons, navigation) are hidden during print
Printing from any page other than the admin print action does not produce unintended output
The print layout is clean and readable with appropriate font sizes and no clipped content

constraints: Do not modify files under frontend/src/hooks/ or frontend/src/components/ui/
Do not change the backend data model or Motoko actor
The existing leaderboard ranking and refresh functionality in AdminPage.tsx must remain intact
nonGoals: Adding authentication or access control to the Admin page
Storing per-question answer breakdowns in the backend — use only data already available in the results fetched via getResults()
Adding any new print functionality to the QuizSummary or QuizPage components
